FuncDef: The display mpls l2vc brief command displays information about VPWS connections using the LDP signaling.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
After a VPWS connection is configured or fails, you can use the display mpls l2vc command to view information about the VPWS connection on the device or a specified interface, such as the VC status, AC status, and encapsulation type.
Prerequisites
The basic VPWS function has been configured.
Configuration Impact
If a large number of VPWS connections exist on the device, you are advised to use the regular expression to view specific information about VPWS connections.
